titleStmt.title: George W. Anderson vs. J. C. Mitchell. Sheriff Statement

bibl.title: George W. Anderson vs. J. C. Mitchell. Sheriff Statement
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Territory of Washington King County ss. O. Jho. H. McGraw Sheriff of said County do hereby certify and answer that I have the within named of George W. Anderson in my custody such and cuya of a commitment issued and of the Justice Court for Seattle Precinct in said County: a copy whereof is hereby accused: That in Seattle City and answer that demand has him made of me, for he petition. By one agent of the State of Oregon, when from the G of said State, for the accused of said petition to answer in the State of Oregon, of Multnomah County, in said State to the charged of obtaining money under false pretenses committed by said petitioner in said State named county, in the month of September 1889, which said in charge one offense agaisnt the of said State and that said petitioner has him by me detained by virtue of such demand and of said paper and of said committment of said agent. J. H. McGraw
Subscribed and sworn to October 3rd, 1889 R. M. Hopkins. Clerk.
